webcrawler_project.crawler.manager module¶

class webcrawler_project.crawler.manager.CrawlManager(max_pages)¶

Bases: object

Manages the crawling process, including URL scheduling and page saving limits.

add_url(url)¶

Adds a new URL to the scheduler if it hasn’t been visited yet. Args:

url (str): The URL to be added to the scheduler.

get_url()¶

Retrieves the next URL from the scheduler. Returns:

str: The next URL to be processed.

has_next()¶

Checks if there are more URLs to process in the scheduler. Returns:

bool: True if there are URLs left to process, False otherwise.

increment_saved()¶

Increments the count of saved pages and returns the new count. It’s a sub-thread-safe operation to ensure that the count is updated correctly across multiple threads. Returns:

int: The updated count of saved pages.

should_continue()¶

Checks if the crawling process should continue based on the number of saved pages. Returns:

bool: True if the number of saved pages is less than the maximum allowed, False otherwise.
